summary: BuildRequest specifies no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple backend and frontend feature changes (authorization/user profiles, field/task UI enhancements, icon/background libraries, layout changes), which are therefore unrequested relative to the provided BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend authorization and access-control logic (role assignment, permission checks) plus user profile CRUD APIs.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, yet substantial new auth/profile behavior appears in backend changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Field background color selection/persistence and associated UI picker plus CSS variables for 20 background options (light/dark).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements), but new background color utilities, dialog UI, and global CSS variables were added/modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Large predefined icon library and color palette utilities for field appearance, used in edit UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements), but icon/color utility module and icon picker support were added/expanded.

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard/field card attribute layout change to a responsive 3-column grid and other UI behavior changes around field/task displays.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements), but FieldCard layout and related UI were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional frontend app behaviors described in summaries: boot orchestration/retry logic, logout/cache clearing, import/export buttons with guards, task undo toast, and various dialog behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements); these features are described as implemented in the diff summary file.
